title: Sequential PNG Preview Tool
description: After Effects plugin for previewing sequential PNG files directly in the composition panel.
content:
# Sequential PNG Preview Tool

A powerful After Effects plugin that allows you to preview sequential PNG files directly in your composition without importing each frame individually.

## Features

- **Real-time Preview**: See your PNG sequence play in real-time
- **Frame Control**: Navigate through frames manually or automatically
- **Batch Import**: Import entire sequences with one click
- **Format Support**: Supports various PNG naming conventions
- **Performance Optimized**: Efficient memory usage for large sequences

## Installation

1. Download the plugin ZIP file
2. Extract to your After Effects Scripts folder
3. Restart After Effects
4. Find the tool in Window > Scripts

## System Requirements

- After Effects CC 2019 or later
- Windows 10 or macOS 10.14+
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended)

## Usage

1. Open the Sequential PNG Preview panel
2. Click 'Browse' to select your PNG sequence folder
3. Preview your sequence in real-time
4. Import selected frames or entire sequence

seo.title: Sequential PNG Preview - After Effects Plugin
seo.description: Preview and import PNG sequences in After Effects. Free plugin for efficient animation workflow.

title: Advanced Expression Helper
description: Collection of useful expressions and utilities for After Effects animators and motion graphics artists.
content:
# Advanced Expression Helper

A comprehensive collection of expressions and utilities to speed up your After Effects workflow and create complex animations with ease.

## Included Expressions

### Animation Utilities
- **Bounce**: Natural bouncing animations
- **Elastic**: Elastic spring animations
- **Wiggle Enhanced**: Advanced wiggle with custom parameters
- **Loop Cycle**: Seamless looping animations

### Mathematical Functions
- **Smooth Step**: Smooth interpolation functions
- **Noise Generators**: Various noise patterns
- **Trigonometric Helpers**: Sin, cos, tan utilities
- **Random Generators**: Controlled randomization

### Text Animations
- **Typewriter Effect**: Character-by-character reveal
- **Text Scramble**: Random character shuffling
- **Counter**: Animated number counting
- **Time Display**: Real-time clock display

## Installation

1. Download and extract the plugin
2. Copy expressions to your After Effects expressions folder
3. Access through the Expression Helper panel

## Features

- **One-Click Apply**: Apply expressions with single click
- **Custom Parameters**: Easily adjust expression settings
- **Preview Mode**: See expressions in action before applying
- **Export/Import**: Share custom expressions with team

seo.title: Expression Helper - After Effects Expression Library
seo.description: Comprehensive library of After Effects expressions for animation, motion graphics, and visual effects.

title: Color Palette Generator
description: Generate harmonious color palettes for your design projects with advanced color theory algorithms.
content:
# Color Palette Generator

Create beautiful, harmonious color palettes for your design projects using advanced color theory algorithms and real-time preview.

## Key Features

### Color Harmony Modes
- **Complementary**: High contrast combinations
- **Analogous**: Harmonious adjacent colors
- **Triadic**: Balanced three-color schemes
- **Split-Complementary**: Sophisticated contrast
- **Tetradic**: Rich four-color combinations

### Advanced Options
- **Saturation Control**: Adjust color intensity
- **Brightness Adjustment**: Fine-tune luminosity
- **Hue Shifting**: Explore color variations
- **Accessibility Check**: WCAG compliance testing

### Export Options
- **Multiple Formats**: CSS, SCSS, JSON, Adobe Swatch
- **Code Generation**: Ready-to-use CSS variables
- **Print Ready**: CMYK conversion for print projects
- **Mobile Optimized**: iOS and Android color formats

## Usage

1. Choose a base color or let the tool suggest one
2. Select your preferred harmony mode
3. Adjust parameters to fine-tune the palette
4. Preview colors in different contexts
5. Export in your preferred format

## Perfect For

- Web designers and developers
- Graphic designers
- UI/UX professionals
- Brand designers
- Digital artists

seo.title: Color Palette Generator - Design Tool for Harmonious Colors
seo.description: Generate beautiful color palettes with advanced color theory. Perfect for web design, branding, and digital art projects.
